title: Quick Veggie Quesadillas
ingredients: 1/2 cup Low-Fat Shredded Cheese (Monterey Jack or Cheddar)
1/4 cup Canned Black Beans, rinsed and drained
instructions: Spread half of the cheese on one tortilla. Top with black beans, corn, and remaining cheese.
Place second tortilla on top. Cook in a non-stick skillet over medium heat for 2-3 minutes per side, or until golden brown and cheese is melted.
Remove from skillet, cut into wedges, and serve with salsa and cilantro.
description: A simple and satisfying vegetarian quesadilla packed with flavor, perfect for a quick lunch.

title: Cheesy Paneer Wrap
instructions: Mix the crumbled paneer with garam masala.
Spread yogurt on each tortilla. Top with paneer, cucumber, tomato, and mint.
Roll up tightly and enjoy immediately.
description: A refreshing and flavorful Indian-inspired wrap with protein-rich paneer, perfect for a light lunch.

title: Spicy Cheese & Bean Tacos
ingredients: 1/2 cup Low-Fat Shredded Cheese (Monterey Jack or Cheddar)
1/4 cup Canned Black Beans, rinsed and drained
instructions: Warm tortillas in a dry skillet or microwave.
Fill each tortilla with cheese, black beans, salsa, jalapenos (if using), and cilantro.
Fold in half or roll up and enjoy immediately.
description: Quick and easy vegetarian tacos with a spicy kick, perfect for a satisfying lunch.
